title: DSA Level 1 — Arrays & Basic Problems
concept: Fundamental array operations: traversal, searching, min/max, counting, prefix calculations.

challenges.title: Linear Search in Array
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers and a value X, check if X is present in the array. If present, print the index (0-based) of the first occurrence. Otherwise, print -1.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: integer N. Second line: N integers (the array). Third line: integer X.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: index of first occurrence of X or -1 if not found.

challenges.title: Maximum Element in Array
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, find the maximum value and its index (0-based). If there are multiple occurrences, print the index of the first one.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N space-separated integers.

challenges.title: Minimum Element in Array
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, find the minimum value and its index (0-based). If there are multiple occurrences, print the index of the first one.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.

challenges.title: Sum of Array Elements
challenges.description: Compute the sum of all elements in an array of N integers.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of all elements.

challenges.title: Count Even and Odd
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, count how many elements are even and how many are odd.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.

challenges.title: Reverse Array
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, print the elements in reverse order.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: N integers: the array in reverse order.

challenges.title: Number of Positive, Negative and Zero
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, count how many elements are positive, how many are negative, and how many are zero.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.

challenges.title: Kth Element of Array
challenges.description: Given N, an array of N integers, and an index K, print the element at index K (0-based). If K is out of bounds (K < 0 or K ≥ N), print "Invalid".
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers. Third line: integer K.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer a[K] or the word "Invalid".

challenges.title: Prefix Sum of Array
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, construct another array where the i-th element is the sum of the first i elements of the original array (1-indexed). Print the prefix sums as a sequence.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.

challenges.title: Array is Sorted or Not
challenges.description: Given an array of N integers, determine if the array is sorted in non-decreasing order. If sorted, print "YES", otherwise print "NO".
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
